name: ppm.gumed.edu.pl
description: Polish Platform of Medical Research (PPM) of the Medical University of Gdańsk (MUG). The platform collects, presents and promotes the profiles and achievements of the MUG's employees, PhD students and students. It contains publication achievements from 2013 onward, including articles, monographs, chapters, and research data. The platform enables archiving and sharing of full texts and raw research data in accordance with Open Access licences.
